.class nested public auto ansi sealed Container/ChangeFeedStreamHandlerWithManualCheckpoint extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function Container.ChangeFeedStreamHandlerWithManualCheckpoint(context As ChangeFeedProcessorContext, changes As Stream, checkpointAsync As Func(Of Task), cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
type Container.ChangeFeedStreamHandlerWithManualCheckpoint = delegate of ChangeFeedProcessorContext * Stream * Func<Task> * CancellationToken -> Task

Docs.param: The context related to the changes.
A task representing an asynchronous checkpoint on the progress of a lease.
A cancellation token representing the current cancellation status of the instance.
Docs.summary: Delegate to receive the changes within a execution with manual checkpoint.
Docs.returns: A representing the asynchronous operation that is going to be done with the changes.
